conclusion: The distance between the two cars is equal to the area of the trapezoid in the graph.
The area of the trapezoid is equal to the sum of the areas of the two triangles.
The area of the first triangle is 0.5 × 25 × 15 = 187.5m.
The area of the second triangle is 0.5 × 25 × 15 = 187.5m.
The distance between the two cars is 187.5 + 187.5 = 375m.
